verses.text: There was a man of the name of Zosimus, who for forty years did not eat bread, and drank no wine, and saw no man's face.
He besought God that He would show him where the Blessed Ones, the sons of Rechab, were hidden.
And an angel of the Lord was sent to him, and said: Zosimus, man of God, behold I am sent to thee to guide thee and show thee the way to the Blessed Ones.
